name: Wight Sorcerer

specials.name: Final Spite
specials.description: Trigger The wight is reduced to 0 Hit Points. Effect The wight makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn’t gain any temporary HP from drain life on this Strike.

specials.name: Drain Life
specials.description: When the wight sorcerer damages a living creature with its claw Strike, the wight gains 5 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or become drained 1. Further damage dealt by the wraith increases the amount of drain by 1 on a failed save to a maximum of drained 4.

specials.name: Wight Spawn
specials.description: A living humanoid slain by a wight’s claw Strike rises as a wight after 1d4 rounds. This wight spawn is under the command of the wight that killed it. It doesn’t have Drain Life or Wight Spawn and becomes clumsy 2 for as long as it is a wight spawn. If the creator of the wight spawn dies, the wight spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wight; it regains its free will, gains Drain Life and Wight Spawn, and is no longer clumsy.

items: Healing Potion (Moderate) (Note:  Healing Potions do not have the positive or negative tag so by RAW they heal undead), Brooch of Shielding, Wand of Mindlink
